markdown:
Born of the souls of doomsayers and cult leaders who sought to undermine and unravel reality, katpaskirs are demons of nihilism and unmaking. **[Recall Knowledge - Fiend](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 40 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 38 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 35 [Katpaskir](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2524) **Source** [Pathfinder #191: The Destiny War](/Sources.aspx?ID=199) pg. 81 **Perception** +31; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [_see invisibility_](/Spells.aspx?ID=271), warp sense **Languages** [Abyssal](/Languages.aspx?ID=12), [Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Celestial](/Languages.aspx?ID=16), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2); [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) 100 feet **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +31, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +35, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +31, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +33, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +32, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +31, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +31 **Str** +6 **Dex** +5 **Con** +9 **Int** +7 **Wis** +6 **Cha** +5 --- **AC** 41 **Fort** +35 **Ref** +29 **Will** +30 +1 status to all saves vs. [magic](/Traits.aspx?ID=103) **HP** 415 **Immunities** [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126) **Weaknesses** [cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=375) 15, good 15 **Breach Planar Wards** **Trigger** An effect (save only for those of items with the [artifact](/Traits.aspx?ID=253) trait) attempts to prevent the katpaskir from using a [teleportation](/Traits.aspx?ID=156) effect or from casting [_summon fiend_](/Spells.aspx?ID=323); **Effect** The katpaskir attempts to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) the triggering effect (counteract modifier of +29).
**Distortion Field** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206)) 30 feet. Reality bends and warps on the level of all senses without displacing the katpaskir's actual location. Creatures of the katpaskir's choice who start their turn in the aura must succeed at a DC 37 Will save or treat the area as greater difficult terrain and [uneven ground](/Rules.aspx?ID=456) (DC 20). A creature who succeeds still treats the area as difficult terrain. For such creatures, the distance through the aura is doubled for determining range penalty.
**Mirrored Summons** **Trigger** A creature within 30 feet that the katpaskir is aware of uses magic to summon or otherwise conjure a good-aligned creature; **Effect** The katpaskir casts [_summon fiend_](/Spells.aspx?ID=323), regaining the daily ability to do so if needed. This effect is automatically sustained as long as the triggering summoning is sustained, for up to 1 minute.
**Warp Sense** The katpaskir senses changes in the planar fabric within 1 mile, including any [teleportation](/Traits.aspx?ID=156) effect, sensing the direction and distance to the disturbance. If it senses such a disturbance within 500 feet, the katpaskir can cast [_prying eye_](/Spells.aspx?ID=239) to observe the area without needing line of sight to the location. --- **Speed** 35 feet, burrow 15 feet, fly 35 feet **Melee** claw +34 ([Evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)), **Damage** 3d12+14 slashing plus 1d6 evil **Melee** talon +34 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)), **Damage** 3d8+14 slashing plus 1d6 evil **Divine Innate Spells** DC 40, attack +32 - **4th** [Dimensional Anchor](/Spells.aspx?ID=70) (at will) - **5th** [Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69) (at will), [Prying Eye](/Spells.aspx?ID=239) (at will) - **7th** [Plane Shift](/Spells.aspx?ID=222), [Teleport](/Spells.aspx?ID=338) - **8th** [Banishment](/Spells.aspx?ID=19) (Ã—3 blink), [Disintegrate](/Spells.aspx?ID=76) - **9th** [Summon Fiend](/Spells.aspx?ID=323) (demons only) - **Constant (9th)** [Freedom of Movement](/Spells.aspx?ID=128), [See Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=271) **Rituals** DC 40 - **1st** [Abyssal Pact](/Rituals.aspx?ID=21) **Dimensional Ambush** ([Conjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=33), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Teleportation](/Traits.aspx?ID=156)) The katpaskir casts [_dimension door_](/Spells.aspx?ID=69), then makes a melee Strike that deals three extra dice of damage. This Strike counts as two attacks when calculating the katpaskir's multiple attack penalty.
Rift Makers Katpaskirs sense weaknesses in planar fabric. These demons worm their way into spaces between dimensions and break down the barriers. They leave holes aimed at causing chaos and dissolution. In this way, katpaskirs gnaw at reality, hoping to one day unravel it.
name: Katpaskir

Born of the souls of doomsayers and cult leaders who sought to undermine and unravel reality, katpaskirs are demons of nihilism and unmaking.
</summary>
spell_markdown: [Banishment](/Spells.aspx?ID=19), [Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69), [Dimensional Anchor](/Spells.aspx?ID=70), [Disintegrate](/Spells.aspx?ID=76), [Freedom of Movement](/Spells.aspx?ID=128), [Plane Shift](/Spells.aspx?ID=222), [Prying Eye](/Spells.aspx?ID=239), [See Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=271), [Summon Fiend](/Spells.aspx?ID=323), [Teleport](/Spells.aspx?ID=338)
summary: Born of the souls of doomsayers and cult leaders who sought to undermine and unravel reality, katpaskirs are demons of nihilism and unmaking.

Distortion Field (aura) 30 feet. Reality bends and warps on the level of all senses without displacing the katpaskir's actual location. Creatures of the katpaskir's choice who start their turn in the aura must succeed at a DC 37 Will save or treat the area as greater difficult terrain and uneven ground (DC 20). A creature who succeeds still treats the area as difficult terrain. For such creatures, the distance through the aura is doubled for determining range penalty. Mirrored Summons Reaction Trigger A creature within 30 feet that the katpaskir is aware of uses magic to summon or otherwise conjure a good-aligned creature; Effect The katpaskir casts summon fiend , regaining the daily ability to do so if needed. This effect is automatically sustained as long as the triggering summoning is sustained, for up to 1 minute. Warp Sense The katpaskir senses changes in the planar fabric within 1 mile, including any teleportation effect, sensing the direction and distance to the disturbance. If it senses such a disturbance within 500 feet, the katpaskir can cast prying eye to observe the area without needing line of sight to the location. --- Speed 35 feet, burrow 15 feet, fly 35 feet Melee Single Action claw +34 (Evil, Magical), Damage 3d12+14 slashing plus 1d6 evil Melee Single Action talon +34 (Agile, Evil, Magical), Damage 3d8+14 slashing plus 1d6 evil Divine Innate Spells DC 40, attack +32 - 4th Dimensional Anchor (at will) - 5th Dimension Door (at will), Prying Eye (at will) - 7th Plane Shift, Teleport - 8th Banishment (Ã—3 blink), Disintegrate - 9th Summon Fiend (demons only) - Constant (9th) Freedom of Movement, See Invisibility Rituals DC 40 - 1st Abyssal Pact Dimensional Ambush Two Actions (Conjuration, Divine, Teleportation) The katpaskir casts dimension door , then makes a melee Strike that deals three extra dice of damage. This Strike counts as two attacks when calculating the katpaskir's multiple attack penalty. Rift Makers Katpaskirs sense weaknesses in planar fabric. These demons worm their way into spaces between dimensions and break down the barriers. They leave holes aimed at causing chaos and dissolution. In this way, katpaskirs gnaw at reality, hoping to one day unravel it.
